problem_text_cn: 如图,将边长为6cm的等边△ABC沿边BC向右平移5cm,得到△A′B′C′,则四边形ABC′A′的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the equilateral △ABC with side length N_0 is translated by N_1 to the right along the edge BC, and △A′B′C′ is obtained, then the perimeter of quadrilateral ABC′A′ is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平移的定义,理解平移的定义求得AA′和BC′的长是关键
